alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:37PM CDT until July 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 437 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elba, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Clowers Crossroads, Arcus, Woodland Grove Church, Jack and Java. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
